qualityCheck.name: packageId pattern matches "scope.identifier.revision"
qualityCheck.description: Check against LTER requirements for scope.identifier.revision
qualityCheck.expected: 'knb-lter-abc.n.m', where 'abc' is an LTER site acronym and 'n' and 'm' are whole numbers

qualityCheck.name: EML version 2.1.0 or beyond
qualityCheck.description: Check the EML document declaration for version 2.1.0 or higher
qualityCheck.explanation: Validity of this quality report is dependent on this check being valid.

qualityCheck.name: Document is schema-valid EML
qualityCheck.explanation: Validity of this quality report is dependent on this check being valid.

qualityCheck.name: Document is EML parser-valid
qualityCheck.description: Check document using the EML IDs and references parser
qualityCheck.expected: Validates with the EML IDs and references parser
qualityCheck.found: EML IDs and references parser succeeded
qualityCheck.explanation: Validity of this quality report is dependent on this check being valid.

qualityCheck.name: A 'methods' element is present
qualityCheck.description: All datasets should contain a 'methods' element, at a minimum a link to a separate methods doc.
qualityCheck.expected: presence of 'methods' at one or more xpaths.

qualityCheck.name: There are no duplicate entity names
qualityCheck.description: Checks that content is not duplicated by other entityName elements in the document
qualityCheck.expected: entityName is not a duplicate within the document
qualityCheck.explanation: Data Manager requires a non-empty, non-duplicate entityName value for every entity
qualityCheck.suggestion: Declare a non-empty entityName and ensure that there are no duplicate entityName values in the document

qualityCheck.name: Length of entityName is not excessive (less than 100 char)
qualityCheck.description: length of entity name is less than 100 characters
qualityCheck.expected: entityName value is 100 characters or less

qualityCheck.name: Field delimiter is a single character
qualityCheck.description: Field delimiters should be one character only
qualityCheck.explanation: A valid fieldDelimiter value was found

qualityCheck.name: Record delimiter is present
qualityCheck.description: Check presence of record delimiter. Check that the record delimiter is one of the suggested values.
qualityCheck.expected: A record delimiter from a list of suggested values: \n, \r, \r\n, #x0A, #x0D, #x0D#x0A
qualityCheck.explanation: A valid recordDelimiter value was found

qualityCheck.name: Display downloaded data
qualityCheck.description: Display the first kilobyte of data that is downloaded
qualityCheck.expected: Up to one kilobyte of data should be displayed

qualityCheck.name: URL returns data
qualityCheck.description: Checks whether a URL returns data. Unless the URL is specified to be function="information", the URL should return the resource for download.
qualityCheck.expected: A data entity that matches the metadata

qualityCheck.name: Online URLs are live
qualityCheck.description: Check that online URLs return something

qualityCheck.name: Database table created
qualityCheck.description: Status of creating a database table
qualityCheck.expected: A database table is expected to be generated from the EML attributes.
qualityCheck.found: A database table was generated from the attributes description
qualityCheck.explanation: CREATE TABLE ZooPlanktonSample_NIN_LTER_198("DATE" TIMESTAMP,"STATION" TEXT,"SAMPLE" INTEGER,"ATIME" TIMESTAMP,"REPLICAT" TEXT,"STEMP" FLOAT,"BTEMP" FLOAT,"MESH" FLOAT,"SSAL" FLOAT,"BSAL" FLOAT,"SVOL" FLOAT,"TYPETOW" TEXT,"TTSBO" TEXT,"RPM" INTEGER,"RPT" FLOAT,"DATECAL" TEXT,"FLOSTART" INTEGER,"FLOEND" INTEGER,"NOMINTOW" INTEGER,"PSAMSORT" INTEGER,"NAME" TEXT,"XFACTOR" FLOAT,"NO3M" FLOAT,"HYDROMED" FLOAT,"GASTRVEL" FLOAT,"BIVLARVA" FLOAT,"POLYCHAE" FLOAT,"UNCLADOC" FLOAT,"OSTRACOD" FLOAT,"ACTONSAA" FLOAT,"ACTONSAC" FLOAT,"CENTHAMA" FLOAT,"CENTHAMC" FLOAT,"EURYAFFA" FLOAT,"EURYAFFC" FLOAT,"LABIAESA" FLOAT,"LABIAESC" FLOAT,"PARVCRAA" FLOAT,"PSECOROA" FLOAT,"PSECOROC" FLOAT,"UCALSPPA" FLOAT,"UCALSPPC" FLOAT,"TEMTURBA" FLOAT,"TEMTURBC" FLOAT,"UNCALSPP" FLOAT,"EUTACUTA" FLOAT,"UNIHARPA" FLOAT,"OITHSPPC" FLOAT,"UNICYCLA" FLOAT,"UNICOPEN" FLOAT,"UNICOPEA" FLOAT,"UNICOPEC" FLOAT,"BARNNAUP" FLOAT,"BARNCYPR" FLOAT,"CRABLIKZ" FLOAT,"BRYOZOAN" FLOAT,"BIPIBRAC" FLOAT,"DOLIOLAR" FLOAT,"OPHIOPLU" FLOAT,"ECHINOPL" FLOAT,"ASCIDIAL" FLOAT,"LARVACEA" FLOAT,"OTHERPLA" FLOAT,"TOTZPK" FLOAT,"ACARTIA" FLOAT,"CENTROP" FLOAT,"BARNACLE" FLOAT,"EURYTEMO" FLOAT,"TOTCOPEP" FLOAT,"PSECOROT" FLOAT);

qualityCheck.name: Data are examined and possible record delimiters are displayed
qualityCheck.description: If no record delimiter was specified, we assume that \r\n is the delimiter. Search the first row for other record delimiters and see if other delimiters are found.
qualityCheck.expected: No other potential record delimiters expected in the first row.
qualityCheck.found: No other potential record delimiters were detected. A valid record delimiter was previously detected

qualityCheck.name: Display first insert row
qualityCheck.description: Display the first row of data values to be inserted into the database table
qualityCheck.expected: The first row of data values should be displayed

qualityCheck.name: Data does not have fewer fields than metadata attributes
qualityCheck.description: Compare number of fields specified in metadata to number of fields found in a data record

qualityCheck.name: Data does not have more fields than metadata attributes
qualityCheck.description: Compare number of fields specified in metadata to number of fields found in a data record

qualityCheck.name: Data can be loaded into the database
qualityCheck.description: Status of loading the data table into a database
qualityCheck.expected: No errors expected during data loading or data loading was not attempted for this data entity
qualityCheck.found: The data table loaded successfully into a database

qualityCheck.name: Number of records in metadata matches number of rows loaded
qualityCheck.description: Compare number of records specified in metadata to number of records found in data
qualityCheck.explanation: The number of records found in the data table (1490) does not match the 'numberOfRecords' value specified in the EML (745)
